channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Component_Partition_Template_Partition data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer Template Partition. Local id A partition's id. Type: integer isGrow A flag indication if a partition will be the grow partition. The grow partition will have its size adjusted to fill all available space on a hard drive. Type: boolean partitionName A partition's default name.
